Reviews.Content: booked 3 roomsone twin 2 doubles 5 staff told paid booking confirmation pre paid vouchers 3 check told pay staff refused help eventually 3 returned removed belongings resold front house staff worst dealt travel job stay aware 5 city tax payable check
